summary: A young girl discovers surfing and love (in that order) during one transitive summer.
cast: Sandra Dee|James Darren|Cliff Robertson|Arthur O'Connell|The Four Preps|Mary LaRoche|Joby Baker|Tom Laughlin|Sue George|Robert Ellis|Jo Morrow|Yvonne Craig|Patti Kane|Doug McClure|Burt Metcalfe|Bruce Belland|Brad Brown|Dick Clark|Don Clarke|Ed Cobb|Ed Hinton|Glen A. Larson|Shary Marshall|Edward McNally|Cheerio Meredith|Richard Newton|Ruthie Robinson
title: Chiquilla
